channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Gold Futures Flat; Risk Skewed Upside Ahead of Trump's Inauguration
item.description: Gold futures were broadly flat, though risk appeared skewed to the upside ahead of Trump’s inauguration.

item.title: Mortgage rates are at the highest level in nearly 8 months. So why are some people refinancing?
item.description: The 30-year mortgage rate has inched up to the highest level since early last summer. Refinances are unexpectedly going up.

item.title: Trump Coin crashes and recovers after Melania Coin launch. What’s next, for his family and the industry.
item.description: The meme-coin frenzy surrounding President-elect Donald Trump’s launch saw twists and turns over the weekend following the launch of a coin celebratin...

item.title: What can President Trump do for seniors? A lot.
item.description: Older Americans need help with savings, Social Security, Medicare and more.

item.title: FTSE 100 Sets New Record
item.description: The FTSE 100 index traded at a record high, climbing above Friday’s close and previous record of 8505.2.

item.title: The U.S. economy is in a ‘sweet spot’. But markets may be getting one thing wrong, says Goldman Sachs.
item.description: Investors are possibly too pessimistic on the likely pace of Fed rate cuts

item.title: Europe's Gas Price Falls as Market Remains Cautious Ahead of Trump's Inauguration
item.description: European natural-gas prices fell, with an expected flurry of executive orders following Trump’s inauguration potentially including the lifting of a mo...

item.title: ‘I trust that my husband isn’t a gold digger’: I’m inheriting millions of dollars. My husband says I’m ‘selfish’ to keep it. Should I share it?
item.description: “I have been a stay-at-home mom for the past five years and my husband is the sole breadwinner.”

item.title: Trump's Meme Coin Seen as Positive Signal For Cryptos
item.description: Trump’s decision to launch his own cryptocurrency meme coin is a positive signal for the digital asset market, Hargreaves Lansdown said, adding that i...

item.title: Credit Assets Look Attractive as Long as U.S. Interest-Rate Rises Look Unlikely
item.description: Credit assets are currently attractive, BNP Paribas said, adding “Our view remains that rate hikes is a bear-scenario where we should sell credit, but...
